rescuecore2.messages

Class AbstractCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • rescuecore2.messages.AbstractMessage
      • rescuecore2.messages.AbstractCommand
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Command, Message
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AKClear, AKExtinguish, AKLoad, AKMove, AKRescue, AKRest, AKSay, AKSpeak, AKSubscribe, AKTell, AKUnload

    public abstract class AbstractCommand
extends AbstractMessage
implements Command
    A sub-interface of Message that tags messages that are interpreted as agent commands.
